enumValues.name: HRBLOCK
enumValues.description: Available only to HR Block integration.

types.name: Date
types.description: ISO-8601 date object. Format returned will follow `yyyy-MM-dd`.

types.name: DateTime
types.description: ISO-8601 date and time object. Format returned will follow `yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ` where the timezone is UTC.

types.name: Decimal
types.description: A signed decimal number, which supports arbitrary precision and is serialized as a string. Example value: `14.99`.

types.name: URL
types.description: A field whose value conforms to the standard URL format as specified in RFC3986: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt.

types.name: HexColorCode
types.description: A field whose value is a hex color code: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_colors.

types.name: JSON
types.description: The `JSON` scalar type represents JSON values as specified by [ECMA-404](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-404.pdf).

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: OffsetPageInfo
types.description: Information about pagination in a connection.

fields.name: totalPages
fields.description: Total number of pages in the connection.

fields.name: totalCount
fields.description: Total number of nodes in the connection.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Currency
types.description: A medium of exchange in common use.

fields.name: symbol
fields.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

fields.name: exponent
fields.description: Expresses the relationship between a major currency unit and its minor currency unit. The number of digits found to the right of the decimal place to represent the fractional part of this currency (assumes a base of 10).

types.name: Money
types.description: A medium of exchange in common use.

fields.name: raw
fields.description: Value represented in only the minor currency unit.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

types.name: Query
types.description: The schemaâ€™s entry point for queries.

args.name: code
args.description: Code of currency.

args.name: code
args.description: Code of country.

args.name: code
args.description: Code of province.

args.name: page
args.description: 1-based page number to retrieve.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Limit on how many items each page should return.

args.name: id
args.description:
ID of business.
- If defined, it will fetch that business.
- If not defined and the access token is restricted to a single business, it will fetch that business.
- If not defined and the access token can access multiple businesses, it will fetch the user's default business. To set a default business see https://support.waveapps.com/hc/en-us/articles/208621226.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

inputFields.name: addressLine1
inputFields.description: Address line 1 (Street address/PO Box/Company name).

inputFields.name: addressLine2
inputFields.description: Address line 2 (Apartment/Suite/Unit/Building).

inputFields.name: city
inputFields.description: City/District/Suburb/Town/Village.

inputFields.name: provinceCode
inputFields.description: State/County/Province/Region Code ([ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2)).

inputFields.name: countryCode
inputFields.description: Country Code.

inputFields.name: postalCode
inputFields.description: Zip/Postal Code.

fields.name: nameWithArticle
fields.description: Name of the country with the appropriate article.

enumValues.description: Congo, The Democratic Republic of the

enumValues.name: GS

enumValues.name: SH

types.name: BusinessNode
types.description: An object belonging to a `Business` with an `ID`.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the node belongs to.

types.name: Business
types.description: An organization and legal entity made up of an association of people.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the business.

fields.name: isPersonal
fields.description: Is the business a personal one with limited functionality compared to regular businesses.

fields.name: organizationalType
fields.description: The organization type of the business.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the business.

fields.name: fax
fields.description: The fax number of the business.

fields.name: mobile
fields.description: The mobile/cell number of the business.

fields.name: tollFree
fields.description: The toll free number of the business.

fields.name: isClassicAccounting
fields.description: Does business use classic accounting system.

fields.name: isClassicInvoicing
fields.description: Does business use classic invoicing system.

fields.name: isArchived
fields.description: Is the business hidden from view by default.

fields.name: modifiedAt
fields.description: When the business was last modified.

fields.name: account
fields.description: Get an account of the business.

args.name: id
args.description: ID of account.

fields.name: accounts
fields.description: Chart of Accounts for the business.

args.name: page
args.description: 1-based page number to retrieve.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Limit on how many items each page should return.

args.name: subtypes
args.description: Find accounts matching one of these subtypes.

args.name: types
args.description: Find accounts matching one of these types.

args.name: isArchived
args.description: Find accounts matching isArchived. Use null to not filter.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: Get a customer of the business.

args.name: id
args.description: ID of customer.

fields.name: customers
fields.description: List of customers for the business.

args.name: page
args.description: 1-based page number to retrieve.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Limit on how many items each page should return.

args.name: sort
args.description: Order result by specified options.

args.name: email
args.description: Find customers matching an email address.

args.name: modifiedAtAfter
args.description: Find customers that were modified after this date.

args.name: modifiedAtBefore
args.description: Find customers that were modified before this date.

fields.name: invoice
fields.description: Get an invoice of the business. Requires `isClassicInvoicing` to be `false`.

args.name: id
args.description: ID of invoice.

fields.name: invoices
fields.description: List of invoices for the business. Requires `isClassicInvoicing` to be `false`.

args.name: page
args.description: 1-based page number to retrieve.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Limit on how many items each page should return.

args.name: sort
args.description: Order result by specified options.

args.name: status
args.description: Find invoices by status.

args.name: customerId
args.description: Find invoices for a customer.

args.name: currency
args.description: Find invoices in a currency.

args.name: sourceId
args.description: Find invoices that were created from a particular source.

args.name: invoiceDateStart
args.description: Find invoices dated on or after this date.

args.name: invoiceDateEnd
args.description: Find invoices dated before or on this date.

args.name: modifiedAtAfter
args.description: Find invoices that were modified after this date.

args.name: modifiedAtBefore
args.description: Find invoices that were modified before this date.

args.name: invoiceNumber
args.description: Find invoices with invoice number containing this string. Note that a query for `12` would find invoices with numbers `12`, `112`, `120`, `121`, `122`, etc.

fields.name: accentColor
fields.description: Color to represent the brand of the business.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name or business name of the customer.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: First name of the principal contact.

fields.name: lastName

fields.name: displayId
fields.description: User defined id for the customer. Commonly referred to as Account Number.

fields.name: mobile

fields.name: currency

fields.name: shippingDetails

fields.name: modifiedAt

fields.name: isArchived

types.name: Product
types.description: Product (or service) that a business sells to a customer or purchases from a vendor.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the product belongs to.

fields.name: incomeAccount
fields.description: The income account to associate with this product, set when isSold.

fields.name: expenseAccount
fields.description: The expense account to associate with this product, set when isBought.

fields.name: defaultSalesTaxes
fields.description: Default sales taxes to apply on product.

fields.name: internalId
fields.description: The primary key used internally at Wave.
fields.deprecationReason: Exposed internal IDs will eventually be removed in favor of global ID. Use Node.id instead.

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.description: Price per unit in the major currency unit.

fields.name: isSold
fields.description: Is product sold by the business. Allow this product or service to be added to Invoices.

fields.name: isBought
fields.description: Is product bought by the business. Allow this product or service to be added to Bills.

fields.name: isArchived
fields.description: Is the product hidden from view by default.

fields.name: modifiedAt
fields.description: When the product was last modified.

types.name: Account
types.description: A unique record for each type of asset, liability, equity, income and expense. Used as part of a Chart of Accounts.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the account belongs to.

fields.name: classicId
fields.description: The classic primary key used internally at Wave.

fields.name: description
fields.description: User defined description for the account.

fields.name: displayId
fields.description: User defined id for the account.

fields.name: subtype
fields.description: The account subtype classification based on type.

fields.name: isArchived
fields.description: Indicates whether the account is hidden from view by default.

fields.name: sequence
fields.description:
Numerically increasing version, each representing a revision of account data.
As soon as something modifies an account, its sequence is incremented.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: The balance of the account as of the current date.

fields.name: balanceInBusinessCurrency
fields.description: The balance of the account as of the current date in the business currency.

types.name: Estimate
types.description: An approximate bill given to a buyer indicating the products or services, quantities, and expected prices (not a request for payment).

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the estimate belongs to.

fields.name: internalId
fields.description: The primary key used internally at Wave.
fields.deprecationReason: Exposed internal IDs will eventually be removed in favor of global ID. Use Node.id instead.

types.name: RecurringInvoice
types.description: A template that can be used to generate and possibly pay an invoice at regular intervals.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the recurring invoice belongs to.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the recurring invoice.

fields.name: internalId
fields.description: The primary key used internally at Wave.
fields.deprecationReason: Exposed internal IDs will eventually be removed in favor of global ID. Use Node.id instead.

types.name: Invoice
types.description: Document issued to a buyer for payment indicating the products or services, quantities, and agreed prices.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the invoice belongs to.

fields.name: internalId
fields.description: The primary key used internally at Wave.
fields.deprecationReason: Exposed internal IDs will eventually be removed in favor of global ID. Use Node.id instead.

fields.name: modifiedAt
fields.description: When the invoice was last modified.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Entity that was the precursor to the invoice.

fields.name: pdfUrl
fields.description: URL to access PDF representation of the invoice.

fields.name: viewUrl
fields.description: URL to view the invoice online as seen by a customer.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Invoice title at the top of the document.

fields.name: invoiceNumber
fields.description: Unique number assigned to the invoice.

fields.name: poNumber
fields.description: Purchase order or sales order number for the invoice.

fields.name: amountDue
fields.description: Invoice total less amount already paid.

fields.name: amountPaid
fields.description: Total of all payments so far made against this invoice.

fields.name: taxTotal
fields.description: Total of all sales taxes on all line items within the invoice.

fields.name: total
fields.description: Total value of the invoice including sales taxes.

fields.name: exchangeRate
fields.description: Exchange rate to business's currency from the invoice's currency. Used to value the invoice income within Wave's accounting transactions.

fields.name: items
fields.description: The line items (product, unit and price) that make up the invoiced sale.

fields.name: disableCreditCardPayments
fields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept credit card payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by card.

fields.name: disableBankPayments
fields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept bank payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by bank payment.

fields.name: disableAmexPayments
fields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept credit card payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by American Express.

fields.name: itemTitle
fields.description: The label for the 'Item' column in the line items listing.

fields.name: unitTitle
fields.description: The label for the 'Unit' column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

fields.name: priceTitle
fields.description: The label for the 'Price' column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

fields.name: amountTitle
fields.description: The label for the 'Amount' (= unit x price) column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

fields.name: hideName
fields.description: Indicates whether item's product name in item column is hidden in the line items listing.

fields.name: hideDescription
fields.description: Indicates whether item's description in item column is hidden in the line items listing.

fields.name: hideUnit
fields.description: Indicates whether item's unit is hidden in the line items listing.

fields.name: hidePrice
fields.description: Indicates whether item's price is hidden in the line items listing.

fields.name: hideAmount
fields.description: Indicates whether item's amount is hidden in the line items listing.

fields.name: lastSentAt
fields.description: When the invoice was last sent.

fields.name: lastSentVia
fields.description: How the invoice was last sent.

fields.name: lastViewedAt
fields.description: When the invoice was last viewed by the customer.

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: SalesTax
types.description: A tax paid to a taxing authority for the sales of certain goods and services.

fields.name: business
fields.description: Business that the sales tax belongs to.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the sales tax.

fields.name: internalId
fields.description: The primary key used internally at Wave.
fields.deprecationReason: Exposed internal IDs will eventually be removed in favor of global ID. Use Node.id instead.

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A short form or code representing the sales tax.

fields.name: description
fields.description: User defined description for the sales tax.

fields.name: taxNumber
fields.description: The tax's issued identification number from a taxing authority.

fields.name: showTaxNumberOnInvoices
fields.description: Display tax number beside the tax name on an invoice.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: Tax rate effective on 'for' date, or current date if no parameter, as a decimal (e.g. 0.15 represents 15%).

fields.name: rates
fields.description: Tax rates with their effective dates of application

fields.name: isCompound
fields.description: Is a compound tax, or stacked tax. This tax is calculated on top of the subtotal and other tax amounts.

fields.name: isRecoverable
fields.description: Is a recoverable tax. It is recoverable if you can deduct the tax that you as a business paid from the tax that you have collected.

fields.name: isArchived
fields.description: Is the sales tax hidden from view by default.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: When the sales tax was created.

fields.name: modifiedAt
fields.description: When the sales tax was last modified.

fields.name: invoiceDelete

fields.name: invoiceSend

fields.name: invoiceApprove

fields.name: invoiceMarkSent

fields.name: salesTaxRateCreate
fields.description: Set a new rate on a sales tax.

fields.name: moneyTransactionCreate

inputFields.description: Currency of the invoice. If not provided, will use the business's default currency.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Invoice title at the top of the document. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice title.

inputFields.name: subhead
inputFields.description: Invoice subheading text. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice subheading.

inputFields.name: invoiceNumber
inputFields.description: Unique number assigned to the invoice. If not provided, will find the current largest invoice number and add 1.

inputFields.name: poNumber
inputFields.description: Purchase order or sales order number for the invoice.

inputFields.name: invoiceDate
inputFields.description: Date when invoice is issued. If not provided, will use today's date.

inputFields.name: exchangeRate
inputFields.description: Exchange rate to business's currency from the invoice's currency. Used to value the invoice income within Wave's accounting transactions.

inputFields.name: dueDate
inputFields.description: Date when payment is due. If not provided, will apply the business's default invoice payment terms to `invoiceDate` value.

inputFields.name: items
inputFields.description: The line items (product, unit and price) that make up the invoiced sale.

inputFields.name: memo
inputFields.description: Invoice memo (notes) text. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice memo.

inputFields.name: footer
inputFields.description: Invoice footer text. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice footer.

inputFields.name: disableAmexPayments
inputFields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept credit card payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by american express payment. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice settings american express payment state.

inputFields.name: disableCreditCardPayments
inputFields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept credit card payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by card. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice credit card payment state.

inputFields.name: disableBankPayments
inputFields.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept bank payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by bank payment. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice bank payment state.

inputFields.name: itemTitle
inputFields.description: The label for the 'Item' column in the listing of line items on the invoice. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice column item title.

inputFields.name: unitTitle
inputFields.description: The label for the 'Unit' column in the listing of line items on the invoice. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice column unit title.

inputFields.name: priceTitle
inputFields.description: The label for the 'Price' column in the listing of line items on the invoice. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice column price title.

inputFields.name: amountTitle
inputFields.description: The label for the 'Amount' (= unit x price) column in the listing of line items on the invoice. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice column amount title.

inputFields.name: hideName
inputFields.description: Indicates whether item's product name in item column is hidden in the line items listing. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice item name visibility.

inputFields.name: hideDescription
inputFields.description: Indicates whether item's description in item column is hidden in the line items listing. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice item description visibility.

inputFields.name: hideUnit
inputFields.description: Indicates whether item's unit is hidden in the line items listing. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice item unit visibility.

inputFields.name: hidePrice
inputFields.description: Indicates whether item's price is hidden in the line items listing. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice item price visibility.

inputFields.name: hideAmount
inputFields.description: Indicates whether item's amount is hidden in the line items listing. If not provided, will use the business's default invoice item amount visibility.

fields.name: didSucceed
fields.description: Indicates whether the invoice was successfully created.

types.name: TransactionDirection

inputFields.name: businessId
inputFields.description: The unique identifier for the business.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Name of the tax.

inputFields.name: abbreviation
inputFields.description: An short form or code representing the sales tax. Max 10 characters, and MUST BE UNIQUE within business.

inputFields.name: rate
inputFields.description: The current rate, as a decimal (e.g. 0.15 represents 15%; rounded to nearest 6 decimal places with ties going away from zero).

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: User defined description for the sales tax.

inputFields.name: taxNumber
inputFields.description: The tax's issued identification number from a taxing authority.

inputFields.name: showTaxNumberOnInvoices
inputFields.description: Display tax number beside the tax name on an invoice.

inputFields.name: isCompound
inputFields.description: Is a compound tax, or stacked tax. This tax is calculated on top of the subtotal and other tax amounts.

inputFields.name: isRecoverable
inputFields.description: Is a recoverable tax. It is recoverable if you can deduct the tax that you as a business paid from the tax that you have collected.

fields.name: didSucceed
fields.description: Indicates whether the sales tax was successfully created.

types.name: BalanceType
types.description: Balance type that expresses how to change an account.

enumValues.name: DECREASE
enumValues.description: Decrease using the inverse of the account's normal balance type. For contra accounts whose subtype is `DISCOUNTS` or `DEPRECIATION_AND_AMORTIZATION`, apply the amount in the account's normal balance type.

enumValues.name: INCREASE
enumValues.description: Increase using the account's normal balance type. For contra accounts whose subtype is `DISCOUNTS` or `DEPRECIATION_AND_AMORTIZATION`, apply the amount in the inverse of the account's normal balance type.

inputFields.name: accountId
inputFields.description: ID of the anchor account.

inputFields.description: ID of the account associated with the line item.

inputFields.name: balance
inputFields.description: How the account should change in relation to the amount.

inputFields.name: customerId
inputFields.description: ID of the customer associated with the line item.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: Optional description for line item.

inputFields.name: taxes
inputFields.description: Taxes applied to the line item.

inputFields.name: salesTaxId
inputFields.description: ID of the sales tax.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Override the amount of the tax (unsigned).

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByUrl`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

args.name: limit
args.description: Number of occurrences allowed over duration.

args.name: duration
args.description: Number of seconds before limit is reset.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
